column1: a The wasted fuel for each urban area category for 2000 was obtained from table A-6 of TTI's The 2002 Annual Urban Mobility Report referenced below.  The wasted fuel for all other years was calculated using raw data obtained from internet site http://mobility.tamu.edu as of Aug. 5, 2002, where the total annual wasted fuel for each year and urban area was divided by the number of cities in that particular urban area.
